listData.name: 9-11 Month Term Deposit - UNITY
listData.description: Our term deposit accounts are a great way to earn interest on money that you do not need to access on a daily basis. We offer terms of 3 to 36 months to fit in with your investment requirements.

features.additionalInfo: Interest rate is fixed for the term of the deposit
Rates available for 3 to 36 month terms
Upon application, if a deposit is allowed early withdrawal, an interest adjustment will normally apply
Deposits up to $250,000 per account holder are guaranteed by the Federal Government under the Financial Claims Scheme.

Standard interest for terms less than or equal to 12 months, interest is paid at maturity; for terms over 12 months, interest is paid annually and at maturity. For monthly terms, interest is paid every month and at maturity with a reduced rate from the standard interest rate.

constraints.additionalInfo: For deposits over $300,000 rates are by negotiation and subject to acceptance

eligibility.additionalInfo: As a Customer Owned Bank, customers must become a shareholder of Unity Bank to open an account.
Must hold a business account
